sense.name: a person who teaches something to others
sense.examples: Bob's flight instructor thinks Bob is ready to solo. Sally hired a private sailing instructor for the summer. The instructors at the technology seminar received good evaluations from the attendees.

sense.name: a college teacher ranked below assistant professor
sense.examples: John has a two-year position as an instructor at a local college. She got promoted to a tenure-track position after serving as an instructor in the history department.
